about_the_game:
Ling Notes - Xiaofang Half-wall Beauty (with 29999 Ling coins) DLC contains the character Xiaofang Half-wall Beauty costume, along with the DLC with 29999 Ling coins.
A sparse rain washes the lotus, and the beautiful woman gathers the breeze like the moon.
Silver-white cheongsam with fine leaf patterns and pavilions is like coming from the Moon Palace.
In the misty spring in the south of the Yangtze River, a plain cheongsam strolls through the alleys, listening to the dripping sound of rain drops on the umbrella, which is elegant and elegant.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
